body:
Okay, so as many of you know, I recently got my staff application denied, and I won't be playing anymore because there are always these hackers in my timezone,  and there is no staff member online at that time. Basically, i will be coming back in a few months!

Have a good time, cya'll!

title: Temporarily Leaving - Staff

replies.body: sigh... You can always record and report, or ping staff in discord. You are leaving because your app was denied which is kinda dumb.
replies.body_tagged: sigh... You can always record and report, or ping staff in discord. You are leaving because your app was denied which is kinda dumb.

replies.body: Hey, it's sad to see you leave, but temporary leaving threads aren't allowed. Sorry. Good-bye for now! :c
replies.body_tagged: Hey, it's sad to see you leave, but temporary leaving threads aren't allowed. Sorry. Good-bye for now! :c
